attributes.action: Removal of E.U/illegal visitors once committing an offence.
attributes.additional_details: The negative work the E.U has done is not the solution.Look to the past..in the past you stayed in your country,voted for a workable system,but now we've swopped eachothers ways,except things some shouldnt have to,afterall,i thought britain was built around the church,but we have various religions.Less strains on each countries systems & econemies etc.Crazily excepting a E.U situation we did not have a say in & watch crime& our resources drained for others benefits.Once,a system that if you visited,you followed the laws,had the respect to find out what they are,if you break the law then you should be removed,not at u.k's expense.We should not be paying to remove illegals back home,maybe then their country may pull the socks up.Gangs visit to commit crime,visiting drivers not taking our u.k tests &driving on their licence.Crime's grown,lets freeze our borders & clean up the backlog of overstayers & illegal people.Look back,once we were shown respect..now we're used,abused & laughed at.
